content: a thing that would be nice is a release tracker for lints, that shows all the lints, grouped by release, with the number of false positive/etc issues filed, so we can ensure backports happen when necessary

I started implementing some form of issue tracker for lints about 2 years ago: https://github.com/flip1995/rust-clippy/commits/issues_for_lints

But because of limited time and me not being sure where I wanted to go with this, I abandoned this project.
